website_summaries.verdict: Basically a portable HDTV that uses a projector for its display, the LG Compact Pebble Design Smart Minibeam Projector PW800 offers the usual HDMI and VGA ports, plus easy wireless connectivity to mobile devices.
pros: Supports Miracast and WiDi for easy wireless mirroring of cell-phone, tablet, and PC screens
cons: Low brightness limits useful image size, particularly in rooms with ambient light

customer_reviews.title: im sure there is a better picture from other ust projectors at this money
customer_reviews.text: LGPF1000u :You are paying for the connectivity and ease of use, no faffing straight out the box connect a fire stick or cast from your appleandr devices and your away. The internal speakers are ok for dialogue but not much else, but connection via a aux out to my Bose sound touch 30 makes movies come alive, you can also connect via blue tooth. Negatives: A slight curve on the screen when protecting 100" and really not for viewing in the daytime, im sure there is a better picture from other ust projectors at this money, however for it connectivity, portability, true full hd, connected to a ps4 it's great.
customer_reviews.author: n w barlow

customer_reviews.title: If you can make your room very dark, then this is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: It needs to be very dark, otherwise it gets washed out. Not a bit dark, very dark. I have it on the maximum power save (lowest brightness, but almost no fan noise) in a room with almost no light. It is brilliant. Hundred inch picture on the wall, headphone jack to an old Bose speaker - the best viewing experience I have had. Better than the cinema, as there are no distractions and you can be as close as you like to a massive image. I worried that I'd never use it, but I use it regularly - paired with a Fire TV stick.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Roberts

customer_reviews.title: The projector is pretty amazing with low ambient lighting
customer_reviews.text: The projector is pretty amazing with low ambient lighting. However if you have windows near by and are trying to watch this during the day, the picture will be faded. For night time movie watching its amazing, if your looking to replace your TV, I would suggest something with higher lumens for daytime use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality product, excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first projector I've purchased and setup. The projector was highly recommended in a review magazine. It's certainly a high quality product, feels very solid. The instructions are very good with comprehensive ones on line. Take a bit of time to set it up, it's easy but don't rush. Picture quality is brilliant, great colours, bright. Very good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Expert DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Very neat device but NO smart functions!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the product (for what I paid for it) and much smaller than I expected and throws a great image BUT very disappointed to discover this is yet another product crippled by LG that has reduced functionality in the UK. No smart functions, no wireless, ethernet which is not entirely clear as most PF1000U reviews online all tell you its a smart model. As I am only really using this for gaming it is not such an issue for me right now but I am sure I will be cheesed right off in the future if I wanted to properly use it for watching movies as I'll now need to fudge it to do that.
customer_reviews.author: JonesTheSteam

customer_reviews.title: Great projector but pretty Dumb without the WebOS which should have come as a standard
customer_reviews.text: Despite all the positive reviews and feedback on the SmartTV capabilities that differentiate this product from other ultrashort throw projectors,LG reseller in the UK is selling this product without Smart capabilities.i other words this product is sold in the UK without WebOS and a magic remote - Which takes out one of its Unique selling points compared to equally capable and cheap projectors available in the market. It's a dumb decision by the reseller to take out webOS from this product in the UK. Having contacted LG support, they were surprised & blaming the reseller for the product not capable of doing what it says on their website regarding smart TV capabilities
customer_reviews.author: kchekuri

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is at least as good as a sim2 I paid £4k for 10yrs ago ...
customer_reviews.text: At this price it was an absolute bargain. The picture quality is at least as good as a sim2 I paid £4k for 10yrs ago and sold with the house. It is quiet. If it had a zoom it would be perfect. I will be buying more, as every friend I have taken my little cinema to now wants one.
customer_reviews.author: c'est moi

customer_reviews.title: pretty good for the money
customer_reviews.text: The projector itself is very good quality very easy to set up and quick to use The video on the Amazon site clearly shows that you can use Netflix or prime but this is not the case you do need to independently purchase an external device to do this slightly disappointing But otherwise the product is pretty good for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, attractive with good performance if you don’t mind the low resolution.
customer_reviews.text: The PV150G Is an incredibly small projector with picture quality better than those cheap Chinese mega-lumen projectors (always look for “ANSI lumens as your reliable guide to lamp brightness), but requires a dark room and suffers somewhat from the limited resolution (pixel definition is visible from about 2 metres away). Internal speaker should be sufficient for a quiet bedroom as the cooling fan is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: L. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great small size projector
customer_reviews.text: Just fab! Easy to use, works perfectly on MacBook Pro and air as well as iPad Pro . Really easy to use with loads of features which I will probably never use! The size was one of the deciding factors for us as we wanted a small light unit as we carry it around for buisness. Very clear image and just a super quality bit of kit!
customer_reviews.author: BomberUK

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than expected. High quality picture and works without a problem. Super useful to bring anywhere and instantly get a big picture screen. I have been very clumsy with it and dropped many times - would have been certain it would break but keeps working without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: "martin4cfc"

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome. I have a cinema in my living room and I didn’t have to drill holes in my ceiling and mess about with wires in my loft, I just had to put it on a table and it was done. Bloody brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Garamond

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is delightfully small. Found it hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is delightfully small. Found it hard to find the right manual to view how to use the remote. Might be my fault
customer_reviews.author: B. F. Smyth

customer_reviews.title: Such an easy solution over regular projectors
customer_reviews.text: This projector is perfect for movies and gaming, colours are great and its very handy that you can keep the projector on a table close to the wall (short throw) works best in low light conditions! Recommend buying a screen for best viewing quality, i got this on black friday deals for £650 so was well worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Keagan McCann

customer_reviews.title: No CEC
customer_reviews.text: The EU version does not have the Smart TV features, nor does it have CEC - meaning devices such as the Google Chromecast cannot wake it and turn it off. The US/Korean version does.
customer_reviews.author: Alasdair Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Not so portable
customer_reviews.text: It could be brighter for day time viewing but perfect in the dark. It is not that portable. It needs to be smaller. Hd movies are very good. Image quality is very good. The contrast is good enough but it could be a lot better .
customer_reviews.author: dinojan yogan

customer_reviews.title: So much better than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: So much better than I was expecting, unbelievable value. I have this set up straight on to the wall and the picture is excellent. Don't understand why the US version gets wireless built in and we don't, bit strange but anyway I'm still more than happy!
customer_reviews.author: R HOOPER

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture. Weak HDMI slots.
customer_reviews.text: One of the HDMI slot is not working otherwise it's great,
customer_reviews.author: Azurcake

customer_reviews.title: Really cool!
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for the living room, and it is perfect! Quality, colors, sound, size, really light, etc. Really easy to use, good price, I hope it will still work in few years ;)
customer_reviews.author: Maud

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting the smart remote and ui which was not apparent, but everything else = great
customer_reviews.author: Umair A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect projector for the money
customer_reviews.text: Same as title. I have it for over a year now and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Angelus-X

customer_reviews.title: Good enough but is not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Playing games, watch movies ,streaming videos . Overall performance good for me. Sometimes is not connected my phone with it
customer_reviews.author: DannySer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I found this projector to be great for the price. Originally i wasn't planning for it to replace my TV, but it totally did! Setup together with Apple TV & Sonos speakers makes it almost Cinema experience :) Would recommended
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad choice if short throw projection is what’s key to you
customer_reviews.text: Lack of smart features in this day and age is shocking, specially as the American and Asian versions of this projector have the smart features
customer_reviews.author: Tirgan

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to write reviews but this things is magnificent. It was so simple to setup. Was up and running in under a minute. Quality is superb.
customer_reviews.author: SA55

customer_reviews.title: Honestly awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase, does exactly what we wanted and pairs with our sound bar with no problems, hooked up to a chrome cast and it’s honestly one of the best purchases I’ve made in a while!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good projector for mobile people
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Display is clear for the value and can be used for PowerPoint presentations too. Not many connections given free compared to other small brands.
customer_reviews.author: MAYSSA A.

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, but not for daylight watching when the sun is out.
customer_reviews.text: So far a fantastic product. Pity it doesn’t have inbuild smart tv however easily sorted with the HDMI multimedia sticks(although has tv tunner). As mentioned in other reviews 1000lm is not enough to get full experience at bright light, probably alright with very low lumen ambient light (10w). Otherwise I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Buy cables. After that, it’s as good as anything you’d have bought in the mid-90s
customer_reviews.text: Only wireless if you’re not using Apple products apparently. So it doesn’t wirelessly mirror phone screens. Useless therefore. A waste of a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great little projector. Not Full HD but it does a good job even at 70inch
customer_reviews.author: Gav

customer_reviews.title: 👌
customer_reviews.text: Only bad thing is the sound isn’t great, but it easily connects to a Bluetooth speaker. Apart from that, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Just get one!
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, great connectivity, great software. As has been said elsewhere, needs a dark room for optimum viewing, but not going to knock off a star for that!
customer_reviews.author: MR M R GOFFIN

customer_reviews.title: true 1080hd picture
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. Best in a darker room to get the full HD. Keeps good definition upto 100" can definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs Lee

customer_reviews.title: Can't use it
customer_reviews.text: Sorry have not been able to use as cannot get a signal. Have tried USB, hdmi, Bluetooth no joy to date
customer_reviews.author: Janice Minchella

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Upon receiving this item LG PF1000U I immediately put a test on it and its working so well so hoping it will last as per specs 30,000hrs... Thanks Amazon UK...
customer_reviews.author: Matrix

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Little and efficient! easy to use. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul PETRAS

customer_reviews.title: On time delivery. Quality and performance 100% satisfactory. ...
customer_reviews.text: On time delivery. Quality and performance 100% satisfactory. Minor downside is the fan noise but you will get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good projector and replacing traditional tv
customer_reviews.text: This should have Android application in build otherwise all other functions are fine
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product
customer_reviews.text: No dust cover no on or off switch on power box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little projector that as a UST has very little noise
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality and all rounder, good 1080p for the price
customer_reviews.author: Gurveer V.

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t buy anything from Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: This one is bit different than being sold in the market. It doesn't come with magic remote and also can't be connected to wifi. It doesn't have smart TV apps.
customer_reviews.author: Dinesh

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Pictures used for PF1000U
customer_reviews.text: Some of the pictures are incorrect there is no Lan connection it has a VGA in instead, (begs the question who the hell spends this sort of money on a projector and then uses VGA?) also only one usb. I was aware of this when I ordered. but it is a bit ridiculous to use pictures of a model unavailable in this region. I plan to use it mostly with Kodi on a fire stick, so its fine for my needs and so far I'm happy with the projector, but 2 point off for the mistake, it would have been 1 off if it was a cheap item, but at this price point its not ok.
customer_reviews.author: shaun procter

customer_reviews.title: Great Ultra Short Throw Projector
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing piece of kit. Very easy to set up and use. Plugged a USB drive in and have access to all my movies. Works with an Amazon fire stick and my xbox one. Not cheap but after buying a couple of inferior led projectors, I'm so happy I went for the PF1000U. Picture is bright and clear. Ultra short throw and an aerial connection mean this could be a genuine competitor for a TV although it does suffer a little if the room is too light. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very good projector capable of projecting very natural colours
customer_reviews.text: Very good projector capable of projecting very natural colours. Best used with external amp/speakers but the internal speakers are not bad. Fan noise is barely audible on maximum eco, but gets more noticeable on low eco (max brightness). Only real issue I have is that the black level is not that great, but the ultra short throw nature makes the projector very home-friendly and easy to use. Overall I like this projector a lot.
customer_reviews.author: A Moreton

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, Bought on lighting deal so pleased with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great projector,Bought on lighting deal so pleased with price. Used a digital optical cable to link to sonos play bar. Picture quality is good on a normal painted wall,but I imagine it would be even better on a screen. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Edwards

customer_reviews.title: No smart remote included
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the quality of the projector but disappointed that it wasn't exactly as advertised. It didn't come with smart remote and doesn't have smart programming as I expected. adverts for this product should be more transparent for those customers buying it in the uk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value with very short throw. We have on the sideboard up against the wall and get a 4-5 foot wide picture from it. Not silent, but still very quiet and unobtrusive. A great upgrade from our previous projector which required moving furniture around. Internal speaker not up to much.
customer_reviews.author: A. Percy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Full HD LED projector for £700
customer_reviews.text: The projector is straight out of the box plug in & play. The picture is brilliant but for a really large screen you need to place the projector down low. Mine is approximately 70cm away from the wall for a 120” screen. 2.5m x 1.6 The only point to note is it works better in a darkened room so if you want the full cinema experience block out any light & it’s amazing. As regards the sound I don’t know as I am running it through an onkyo receiver, bowers & Wilkins setup. A complete bargain for £700 Photos added
customer_reviews.author: james h.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy got this at a special price from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Very happy got this at a special price from Amazon. Was sceptical but performs better than my optoma without any real.noticable rainbow effect. Use mainly for gaming and happy with the response time in game mode. Beats a traditional long throw projector. Not as bright as some of the competitors but found that the other brands were so bright it hurt my eyes this is just perfect for late evenings.
customer_reviews.author: S Arora

customer_reviews.title: Epic bit of kit - highly recommended - the telly in the other room is pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: Epic bit of kit - highly recommended - the telly in the other room is pretty much redundant at night now (this is not so good in the day) - everything is in cinema-size now! Fiona Bruce, Casualty, Gardeners' World, Count Down, Fiona Bruce... What's not to love. Buy it now. Did I mention Fiona Bruce?
customer_reviews.author: Yomi

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and cute projector
customer_reviews.text: Advantages: - Light weight projector - It comes in a really nice bag. - Love its design too. - Screen size is acceptable for mini projector. Disadvantags: - The focus is adjusted manually. - It might be the best screen quality available, but it also need some improvement specially when you use battery mode.
customer_reviews.author: hanan abdulaziz

customer_reviews.title: This product does not have inbuilt smart TV system that the demo video and introduction says
customer_reviews.text: This product does not have inbuilt smart TV system that the demo video and introduction says. Double check before purchasing if you are looking to use Netflix and other browser apps.
customer_reviews.author: Soosie L.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: worked for about 2 hrs and the bulb appeared to blow or not work at all - new projector
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Lovely little projector simple to use and setup great quality picture even without a projector screen bought for my sons room and for use with smartphone easy to send signal via wifi
customer_reviews.author: David mills

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent projector. Way beyond my ecpectations. It has such a great quality image, even with a lamp on In the room and it connects really easilly with my bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and sound when big or small screen
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and sound when big or small screen. Best in a dark room. Seems to disconnect from Bluetooth half way through a movie but that could be my laptop which i have only used so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Waters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product as long as you got a dark enough room.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo Caminiti

customer_reviews.title: More equals less!!!
customer_reviews.text: The more you use it, is ghetto more you see its failings
customer_reviews.author: Teresa canty

customer_reviews.title: Noisy fan
customer_reviews.text: Great picture for the size but very noisy fan. Not a problem in action scenes but when it's just dialogue the fan is pretty audible and that's on its lowest setting. It's not really made for movie watching.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 3D for films, great for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: Steps to enjoy: * Get yourself a set of these 3D glasses:  * Put on a 3D blu-ray * Thank me later The only downside is that unlike the US/Korea versions this lacks the ethernet port and smart features, but plugging in a Chromecast or FireTV stick fixes this nicely. Brightness is decent for the size, the 3D is amazing and flicker-free, there's no perceptible processing lag making it great for gaming. Ever played Rocket League on a 100in screen? No? Then you need this.
customer_reviews.author: PhonicUK

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Great projector with amazing brightness! Stylish design with great picture quality from a reasonable distance but if you get too close you see the diamond pixels but your never going to be sitting that close on a 100" screen!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: OK - good picture. There is no overall keystoning
customer_reviews.text: OK - good picture. There is no overall keystoning, just the individual corner option, so be prepared to take some time to set this up. The bundled manual is very basic - effectively 5 pages of non-safety English-language text for a £1K+ projector is just not enough. There may be more available online - but the portability of the device suggests you may not be in a wifi environment to access it, so be prepared to find the thorough version before you set up also.
customer_reviews.author: J P MEDCALF

customer_reviews.title: Warning Incorrect product!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product showcased was not what was received. This is the non-smart version of the product even though the pictures on display show the output layout as the smart version. Does not come with ethernet or the webOS interface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: full of features and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excelente quality, full of features and easy to use! Really happy
customer_reviews.author: Eliton Roberto Elias

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT BUT DESCRIPTION IS NOT CLEAR - DO NOT BUY IF YOU HAVE A MAC AND WANT WIFI AS IT'S NOT COMPATIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this projector - small, well designed and great if, like me you work in different locations and need a lightweight, good quality projector. HOWEVER the product description given on Amazon does not make it clear it is not compatible with MAC OS. I only discovered this after buying an HDMI to get the Wifi working but obviously it still doesn't. If anyone is looking for one of these and doesn't have a MAC I am currently selling mine on Ebay as I am out of time for the return.
customer_reviews.author: J C Fletcher-Lee

product_meta.title: LG Minibeam PF1000U Portable Projector (Full HD, LED, Ultra short throw, 150,000:1 contrast, 1000 lumens)
product_meta.description:
Size Name:Full HD| Style Name:1000LG Minibeam PF1000U Portable Projector LED (Full HD, 150,000:1 contrast, 1000 lumens)- Black.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x PF1000U
feature_bullets: Ideal for business, TV, movies and gaming use
Compatible with Apple products (hard-wired rather than Bluetooth)
Multimedia through USB (HD DivX movie, music, picture)

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
